exhibitor-guideline.title: Exhibitor Guideline
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-1: Go to the exhibitors’s registration page at
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-3: Enter an active email address. We will send information and notifications to your email.
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-4: Enter a phone number that’s connected to WhatsApp
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-5: Enter the representative full name and title.
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-6: Select the representative job function. If you did not find a suitable one, you can select 'Other'
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-7: Enter a password and retype your password in 'Confirm Password'
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-10: Enter your company’s website. If your company doesn’t have a website, you can enter dash (-)
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-11: Choose your company’s country of origin
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-12: If you choose Indonesia, please select the province of your company
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-13: Tick the field(s) that best describes your company
exhibitor-guideline.guideline-14: Once you have finished filling in the registration form, click __Register__. You'll be registered in our system and may login to our website. Further guidelines will be informed later.

who-exhibit.title: Who Exhibits?
who-exhibit.overview: There will be Medical Devices Manufacturer & Distributor, Hospital Equipment and Material Manufacturer & Distributor, Hospital Consultant, and Hospital Facility Contractor divided in 6 Industry Areas:

area-4.name: Hospital Informatics
area-4.sub-area: IOT, AI, Big Data, Smart Hospital

area-5.name: Hospital Mechanics
area-5.sub-area: Plumbing, Lift & AC, Medical Gas, Steam, Fire Fighting Installation, Ambulance

area-7.name: COVID-19 Produts
area-7.sub-area: PCR Equipment, Antigen Equipment, Isolation Chamber, Ventilator, Oxygen Equipment, Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)

why-exhibit.title: Why Exhibit?
why-exhibit.overview: In HEF 2021 you get the chance to meet potential clients in a one one meeting through our online booking system and business matching.
why-exhibit.profit-1: A joint forum between regulators (government), academics (experts/universities), and industries to facilitate the hospital needs that’s up to standards and financial conditions of the hospital.
why-exhibit.profit-2: Increase exposure towards your products by demonstrating it during selected webinars and in our exhibition hall. (Products presented must meet the national or international standards
why-exhibit.profit-3: Connect with potential buyers (up to 40 potential buyers in 3 days)
why-exhibit.profit-4: The opportunity to be recommended by the association as a company with technically appropriate products and services (based on assessment results by IAHE) to all IAHE members.
why-exhibit.profit-5: The opportunity to partner with IAHE to continuously encourage and build hospitals in Indonesia that are safer, more environmentally friendly, affordable, secure and beneficial.
